definition: to follow sb's tracks/to tail/to shadow/tracking
heel/to follow closely/to go with/(of a woman) to marry sb/with/compared with/to/towards/and (joining two nouns)

sentences.english: Trace hooks can be applied at the entry or exit of any function.
sentences.chinese: 跟踪钩子可以应用于任何函数的入口或出口。

sentences.english: That is the entire stalker problem right there.
sentences.chinese: 这才是整个跟踪狂问题的症结所在。

sentences.english: Continuously track and monitor key contract clauses for risks and mitigations.
sentences.chinese: 对合同的特别条款进行有效跟踪。

sentences.english: There should be absolutely no behavioral tracking of minors.
sentences.chinese: 对于未成年人应该是完全没有的行为跟踪的。

sentences.english: That means programmers have to keep track or recompute how much space is left all the time.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着程序员必须始终跟踪或重新计算剩余的空间。

sentences.english: The identifications of equipments and their components should be easy to trace.
sentences.chinese: 材料和设备散件的标识应易于进行跟踪。

sentences.english: Dual-space approach is for multi-target tracking.
sentences.chinese: 面目标跟踪采用对偶空间转换算法等方法。

sentences.english: The hackers then follow their marks as they move to their online bank accounts.
sentences.chinese: 黑客就可以根据木马留下的记号跟踪他们的网银账号。

sentences.english: Masking a trace helps to minimize the amount of information that is captured.
sentences.chinese: 通过屏蔽跟踪，有助于减少所捕捉的信息量。

sentences.english: The hound picked up the fox's smell and started to chase after it.
sentences.chinese: 猎犬嗅出了狐狸的气味，便开始跟踪追赶。

sentences.english: The dog went of and quested.
sentences.chinese: 只狗离去而开始进行跟踪搜寻了。

sentences.english: Rather than just go, the police will follow.
sentences.chinese: 宁律平刚走，警察便跟踪而去。

sentences.english: We present a novel current-following SPWM inverter with delay-loop control.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一种滞环控制的电流跟踪型SPWM逆变器。

sentences.english: Study on TV-Tracking System Based on Morphology Filering;
sentences.chinese: 文中提出了一种对运动多目标的电视跟踪方法。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the rheologic performance and film-forming of the emulsion were inspected.
sentences.chinese: 研究了乳液的室温流变性并跟踪了乳液的成膜情况。

sentences.english: The motion-tracking algorithm implemented for this project is designed for simplicity.
sentences.chinese: 这个项目实现的运动跟踪算法很简单。

definition: to follow a trail/to trace/to pursue
to monitor/to keep a close watch over/surveillance
to tail behind/to tag along/to follow on the heels of
to investigate a crime/to scout/to reconnoiter/reconnaissance/detection/a scout
to try to find out/to trace/to track down
